name: fundamental-vue

scripts.bootstrap: yarn install && yarn --cwd build install && yarn --cwd ui install && yarn --cwd docs install && yarn --cwd server install
scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others --names "dev-server,ui,docs" -c "blue, red,green" "node server" "yarn build:ui:dev --watch" "cd docs && yarn serve"
scripts.serve:prod: concurrently --kill-others --names "dev-server,ui,docs" -c "blue, red,green" "node server" "yarn --cwd ui build --watch --mode production --report" "yarn --cwd docs serve --mode production --report"
scripts.build:all: rm -rf dist && yarn build:ui --mode production && yarn build:docs --mode production && mkdir dist && cp -r ui/dist/* dist && cp -r docs/dist/* dist
scripts.build: yarn build:ui && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r ./ui/dist/*.js dist && cp -r ./ui/dist/*.js.map dist
scripts.lint: yarn --cwd docs lint && yarn --cwd server lint && yarn --cwd ui lint
scripts.lint:dev: yarn --cwd docs lint:dev && yarn --cwd server lint && yarn --cwd ui lint:dev
scripts.lint:pre-commit:
printf "running pre-commit lint..."  && npm run lint && printf "done!
"
scripts.deploy:docs: yarn build:docs && cp ui/dist/*.js docs/dist && gh-pages -d docs/dist

description: SAP Fiori Fundamentals, implemented in Vue.js
author: SAP SE
